mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_config (id, value, label, type, description, sort, remarks, create_by, create_date, del_flag) VALUES (#{id}, #{value}, #{label}, #{type}, #{description}, #{sort}, #{remarks}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update: update t_config set value = #{value}, label = #{label}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, sort = #{sort}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate} where id = #{id}
